# Getting Started {#sec-getting-started}

This section describes how to get started using Databrary.

If you represent an *institution*, see [this section](institutions.qmd) for information about how researchers gain access to Databrary via a formal process of institutional authorization.

If you are a *researcher*, see [this section](researchers.qmd) about how to start the authorization process with your institution.

If you are a research staff member, postdoc, graduate or undergraduate student, see [this section](students.qmd) for information about how to gain access to restricted data via your research supervisor. 

Any person may browse and view Databrary's public materials consistent with the [Terms & Conditions of Use](../appendices/terms.qmd).
